message.body: Yo! Any chance I could crash at your place on Friday night? No worries if not!
Hey, sorry, I just saw this. I don't think that would be a problem, as long as I get a chance to set up my other futon. You'd be amazed at how much unpacking I still have left
Are you sure? I'm sure someone else will let me couch surf if need be. I don't want to make you rush your unpacking. I'm not done with that either!
Well, consider me a safety net, then. My couches both need to be steamed (they still smell like dog, and it's pretty gross), so you'd most like end up in the Room of Boxes
Ha ha. Okay, I will ask around :-)
